meanings.definition: To begin a journey or trip.
meanings.sent1: We embarked on our hike early in the morning.
meanings.sent2: The family embarked on a road trip to the beach.
meanings.sent3: The cat embarked on a mission to catch the elusive red dot.
meanings.sent4: She embarked on a quest for knowledge that would lead her to distant lands.
meanings.sent5: The students embarked on a learning adventure filled with excitement.

meanings.definition: To board a ship or aircraft.
meanings.sent1: Passengers embarked the cruise ship with excitement.
meanings.sent2: The travelers embarked the plane for their vacation.
meanings.sent3: The penguins embarked the iceberg, ready for a chilly journey.
meanings.sent4: He embarked the spaceship, ready to explore the unknown universe.
meanings.sent5: The crew embarked the submarine, diving into the depths of the ocean.

meanings.definition: To start or engage in a new venture or activity.
meanings.sent1: She embarked on a new business venture with determination.
meanings.sent2: The team embarked on a project to help the community.
meanings.sent3: The squirrel embarked on a nut-gathering mission in the park.
meanings.sent4: He embarked on a fitness journey to improve his health.
meanings.sent5: The artist embarked on a painting that would capture the beauty of nature.
